product_name: Lezyne Trigger Drive CO2 Tire Inflator
long_description: Fast, light inflation is the name of the game for the Lezyne Trigger Drive CO2 Tire Inflator, which provides a secure, controllable valve connection for hassle-free use. The small, lightweight CNC-machined aluminum head is both Presta and Schrader compatible, threading directly onto the valve for a secure connection. Integrated trigger valve allows easy and precise control of inflation-simply thread thread the head onto valve and then press down on the inflator head to release CO2. The Lezyne Trigger Drive CO2 Tire Inflator is compatible with all threaded CO2 cartridges; single 16g CO2 cartridge is included.
short_description: Fast, light inflation is the name of the game for the Lezyne Trigger Drive CO2 Tire Inflator, which provides a secure, controllable valve connection for hassle-free use.
